description:
Reentrancy in GoldToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#146-163):
	External calls:
	- (success,None) = TRANSFER.call.value(0).gas(gasleft()())(abi.encode(from,to,value)) (contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#157)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] = allowed[from][msg.sender].sub(value) (contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#160)
	GoldToken.allowed (contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#25) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- GoldToken.allowance(address,address) (contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#221-223)
	- GoldToken.approve(address,uint256) (contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#103-108)
	- GoldToken.decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) (contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#131-137)
	- GoldToken.increaseAllowance(address,uint256) (contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#116-123)
	- GoldToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#146-163)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [GoldToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#L146-L163):
	External calls:
	- [(success,None) = TRANSFER.call.value(0).gas(gasleft()())(abi.encode(from,to,value))](contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#L157)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [allowed[from][msg.sender] = allowed[from][msg.sender].sub(value)](contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#L160)
	[GoldToken.allowed](contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#L25) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [GoldToken.allowance(address,address)](contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#L221-L223)
	- [GoldToken.approve(address,uint256)](contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#L103-L108)
	- [GoldToken.decreaseAllowance(address,uint256)](contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#L131-L137)
	- [GoldToken.increaseAllowance(address,uint256)](contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#L116-L123)
	- [GoldToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](contracts/common/GoldToken.sol#L146-L163)

description:
StableToken.getUpdatedInflationFactor() (contracts/StableToken.sol#463-497) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- timesToApplyInflation = now.sub(inflationState.factorLastUpdated).div(inflationState.updatePeriod) (contracts/StableToken.sol#473)
	- lastUpdated = inflationState.factorLastUpdated.add(inflationState.updatePeriod.mul(timesToApplyInflation)) (contracts/StableToken.sol#493)
markdown:

	- [timesToApplyInflation = now.sub(inflationState.factorLastUpdated).div(inflationState.updatePeriod)](contracts/StableToken.sol#L473)
	- [lastUpdated = inflationState.factorLastUpdated.add(inflationState.updatePeriod.mul(timesToApplyInflation))](contracts/StableToken.sol#L493)

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rateFeedTradingModes[rateFeedID] = info (contracts/BreakerBox.sol#325)
	BreakerBox.rateFeedTradingModes (contracts/BreakerBox.sol#27) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- BreakerBox.addRateFeed(address) (contracts/BreakerBox.sol#173-186)

	State variables written after the call(s):

	[BreakerBox.rateFeedTradingModes](contracts/BreakerBox.sol#L27) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [BreakerBox.addRateFeed(address)](contracts/BreakerBox.sol#L173-L186)
	- [BreakerBox.checkAndSetBreakers(address)](contracts/BreakerBox.sol#L305-L353)
